means: （为某事物）激烈竞争，争夺某事物( vie的现在分词 )
（常用于进行时）（为某事物）与…激烈竞争

sentence.Network_en: Four rescue plans are vying to save the zoo.
sentence.Network_cn: 4个拯救动物园的方案正争得不可开交。

sentence.Network_en: The two are vying for the support of New York voters.
sentence.Network_cn: 两人在争夺纽约选民的支持。

sentence.Network_en: She was surrounded by men all vying for her attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 她周围尽是竞相博得她青睐的男子。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 动漫介绍英文版_百度知道 ... rival 竞争的，对抗的 vying 竞争的 unlock 揭露(秘密)；破译；解读.
enigmatic esoteric crusade ... mundane 世俗的 vying 争夺 introspective 内省.

list.abs: the implication of one person holding both jobs , or of two vying for executive control , is that the role of chairman of the board is insufficient in itself to keep an alpha male ( or female ) fully occupied .一人兼任两个职位，或者两人争夺执行控制权，意味着董事长的角色本身不足以让企业“头号男士”（
three candidates are vying in this election .本届选举中有3名候选人。
China vying for priority access to the pipeline ., 中国正在争取使用管道的优先权.

entry.def: Vying is the present participle of vie .

auth_sentence.content: Garcia is vying for a reserve spot in the outfield.
auth_sentence.res_content: Garcia is vying for a reserve spot in the outfield.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Garcia is vying for a reserve spot in the outfield.

auth_sentence.content: The Ravens are vying for their second Super Bowl victory.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Ravens are vying for their second Super Bowl victory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Ravens are vying for their second Super Bowl victory.

auth_sentence.content: The London-based Betfair is among the companies vying for approval.
auth_sentence.res_content: The London-based Betfair is among the companies vying for approval.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The London-based Betfair is among the companies vying for approval.

sentences.en: The boys were vying to impress her.
sentences.cn: 小伙子们争着给她留下好印象。

sentences.en: The children were vying for the teacher’s attention.
sentences.cn: 孩子们都较着劲想得到老师的注意。
